remarks: In an ordered monoid, the ordering is compatible with group power. This version does not require the monoid to be commutative. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Mar-2018.)
statement:
omndmul.0 $e |- B = ( Base ` M ) $.
omndmul.1 $e |- .<_ = ( le ` M ) $.
omndmul2.2 $e |- .x. = ( .g ` M ) $.
omndmul2.3 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` M ) $.
omndmul2 $p |- ( ( M e. oMnd /\ ( X e. B /\ N e. NN0 ) /\ .0. .<_ X ) -> .0. .<_ ( N .x. X ) ) $.
